wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Charles Scott Napier  (3 February 1899 – 16 June 1946), was a British Army officer who served in the First and  Second World Wars. During the latter he was Chief of Movements and Transportation at the Supreme Headquarters Allied Expeditionary Force (SHAEF) during the campaign in north-west Europe.

response: *Colonel (temporary brigadier) Charles Scott Napier, Royal Engineers.
*Major (acting Lieutenant Colonel) Charles Scott Napier, Royal Engineers.
*Charles Scott Napier (1899–1946), British Army major general
